messages.subject: Re: attachments mailed to the list
messages.msgSnippet: ... pretty easy to upload images to the list photo album.  Attachments tend to cause trouble for people with small mailbox allotments, slow connections, short
messages.messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Jim Gilbert" <jggilbert@E...>
wrote:
> True. I can change the list settings to allow attachments, but it's
pretty easy to upload images to the list photo album. Attachments
tend to cause trouble for people with small mailbox allotments, slow
connections, short tempers and/or limited anti-virus measures.
>
> Jim

Jim -

Please keep the settings this way. For folks that aren't
Yahoo members, there are several free photo hosting sites
that can be used.

http://photobucket.com/


http://arctic.photoisland.com/servlet/com.arcsoft.LoginNew?com=
arcsoftBanner&awp=index3.html&DIRECT=show


http://pictures.care2.com/


Rich S
(one of those on slow connections and who have
a short tempers)

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] attachments mailed to the list
messages.msgSnippet: True.  I can change the list settings to allow attachments, but it s pretty easy to upload images to the list photo album.  Attachments tend to cause trouble
messages.messageBody:
True. I can change the list settings to allow attachments, but it's pretty easy to upload images to the list photo album. Attachments tend to cause trouble for people with small mailbox allotments, slow connections, short tempers and/or limited anti-virus measures.

Jim

You can't send photos and attachments to the list, they get automatically
deleted.


Gordon


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
